src:
Kako se skriti velikemu bratu?  
Ni več skrivnost, da Google zbira podatke o uporabnikih, vse od naših osebnih podatkov, spletnih aktivnosti, lokacije do pregledovanja Gmailovega računa.   
07 Nov 2019, 10:20 by M.K.
V Nedeljskih novicah predstavljamo način, kako se izogniti pretiranemu nadzoru oziroma kako ta nadzor vsaj deloma omejiti.V rubriki Na zdravje pišemo o luskavici. V Sloveniji jo ima od 30.000 do 40.000 ljudi, na svetu pa je okoli 125 milijonov bolnikov. Kakšna vlogo imajo na razvoj luskavice stres in vplivi iz okolja ter kateri so ključni dejavniki za njen nastanek?Preverili smo dogajanje v lasni industriji. Izpadanje las prizadene približno 70 odstotkov moških in do 45 odstotkov žensk, mnogi se odločijo za presajanje las, lasne vložke ali lasuljo. Koliko je ta industrija vredna v Sloveniji in koliko stane presaditev las v Sloveniji v primerjavi s tujino, preverite v Nedeljskih novicah.Kako prepoznati in reševati težave mladostnikov, smo povprašali specialistko psihiatrije in psihoterapevtko Danijelo Moškov. Kaj mladostnike vodi v stisko, kako jo zaznati in pravilno ukrepati?V ZDA razvijajo napravo, ki bo samodejno ugotovila stopnjo vinjenosti voznika in mu v določenih primerih tudi preprečila vožnjo. Predstavili so celo predlog zakona, po katerem bi morali vsi proizvajalci in prodajalci avtomobilov od leta 2014 ta sistem vgraditi v svoja vozila. Več najdete v Nedeljskih novicah.Ne pozabite na TV-vodnik in kulinarično prilogo Odprta kuhinja. Na prodajnih mestih že od četrtka.
text:
How to hide Big Brother?
It's no longer a secret that Google collects user information, from our personal information, online activities, location, to viewing your Gmail account.
07 Nov 2019, 10:20 by M.K.
In the Sunday News, we present a way to avoid or at least partially limit that control. In the Health section, we write about psoriasis. It has between 30,000 and 40,000 people in Slovenia, with around 125 million patients worldwide. What is the role of stress and environmental influences on the development of psoriasis, and what are the key factors for its occurrence? Hair loss affects about 70 percent of men and up to 45 percent of women, many opting for hair transplants, hairpieces or a wig. Check out how much this industry is worth in Slovenia and how much it costs for hair transplants in Slovenia compared to abroad. We asked the psychiatrist specialist and psychotherapist Danijela Moškov how to identify and solve the problems of adolescents. What drives adolescents into distress, how to detect and act on it? In the US, they are developing a device that will automatically detect the driver's level of innocence and, in some cases, prevent him from driving. They even introduced a bill that requires all car manufacturers and dealers to install this system in their vehicles from 2014. See the Sunday News for more. Don't forget the TV guide and the culinary supplement Open Kitchen. On sale since Thursday.
